songs.title: Serenity
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Hey

[Chorus]
Put that shit on everything, I don't wanna ever change (Yeah)
Love me but you doubted me (Yeah), knew it since the beginning (What?)
We got common enemies, depend on you, depend on me (You)
Aura and my energy (You), the evil is serenity
Put that shit on everything, I don't wanna ever change (Yeah)
Love me but you doubted me (Yeah), knew it since the beginning (What?)
We got common enemies, depend on you, depend on me (You)
Aura and my energy (You), the evil is serenity

[Verse]
First year as a rookie, made my, myself a boss
If I want, I got, I'ma, I'ma floss, aw
I sacrificed a lot, but I, I never lost
Manifest my thoughts and watch it come alive
Been around the world, can't find a peace of mind
I tried everything it takes to feel alright
Somehow, you still occupy my mind
Somehow, this was all by design

[Chorus]
Put that shit on everything, I don't wanna ever change (Yeah)
Love me but you doubted me (Yeah), knew it since the beginning (What?)
We got common enemies, depend on you, depend on me (You)
Aura and my energy (You), the evil is serenity
Put that shit on everything, I don't wanna ever change (Yeah)
Love me but you doubted me (Yeah), knew it since the beginning (What?)
We got common enemies, depend on you, depend on me (You)
Aura and my energy (You), the evil is serenity

[Chorus]
Put that shit on everything, I don't wanna ever change (Yeah)
Love me but you doubted me (Yeah), knew it since the beginning (What?)
We got common enemies, depend on you, depend on me (You)
Aura and my energy (You), the evil is serenity
Put that shit on everything, I don't wanna ever change (Yeah)
Love me but you doubted me (Yeah), knew it since the beginning (What?)
We got common enemies, depend on you, depend on me (You)
Aura and my energy (You), the evil is serenity
